text: pelnoh keat( saou lai mean) ban nhnhum daoy asasaamnaech nung saamdei robsa me sramoch . haey keat ban buongsuong som tha ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. saum trong me tda changaoulobangheanh khnhom daembi aoy khnhom arkoun champoh nie k meat robsa trong del ban bratan aoy khnhom ning meateabeta robsakhnhom ning daembi aoy khnhom sang ampeula del trong keab chetd haey saum trong me tda banhchoul khnhom tow knongchamnaom banda khnhom robsa trong del la troemotrauv daoy kdei me tda krounea robsa trong phng choh
